org.hypergraphdb.viewer.phoebe.util
Class PSmallHandle

java.lang.Object
  edu.umd.cs.piccolo.PNode
      org.hypergraphdb.viewer.phoebe.util.PSmallHandle
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.print.Printable, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable
Direct Known Subclasses:
PSmallBoundsHandle
public class PSmallHandle
extends edu.umd.cs.piccolo.PNode

PSmallHandle is used to modify some aspect of Piccolo when it is dragged. Each handle has a PLocator that it uses to automatically position itself. See PBoundsHandle for an example of a handle that resizes the bounds of another node.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Jesse Grosjean
See Also:
Serialized Form
